column4: is there any software to help you with the teerminal like commands that can be saved ,alias etc?
navigating directorys , does it always have to be typed from scratch?

if I understand what you're asking, the terminal runs a program called bash, which has a truly enormous number of features available, including the ability to create command aliases. start with 'man bash' and your eyes will cross. Maybe see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CommandlineHowto
